enrichmentTriggers.comment: Counts detected enrichment triggers (tracks even when enrichment disabled)

metaEntityFormation.comment: Meta-entities are abilities/rules that emerged from clustering, marked with meta-entity tag

hardState.name: Aurora Berg
hardState.description: A towering, many-tiered iceberg whose shelves host rival super-penguin colonies.

hardState.name: Aurora Stack
hardState.description: A vertical colony carved into the sunlit face of Aurora Berg, known for orderly terraces and bright trade banners.

hardState.name: Nightfall Shelf
hardState.description: A shadowed ledge on the far side of Aurora Berg, lit by bioluminescent ice glyphs and whispered deals.

hardState.name: Krill Shoals
hardState.description: Dense drifting clouds of krill that pass regularly beneath Aurora Stack, the lifeblood of its fisheries.

hardState.name: The Glow-Fissure
hardState.description: A deep crack in the ice under Nightfall Shelf that pulses with otherworldly light and warps the currents.

hardState.name: Windward Ridge
hardState.description: A knife-edge crest of ice where the high winds carve strange patterns and carry news between colonies.

hardState.name: The Icebound Exchange
hardState.description: A merchant guild that monopolizes trade through Aurora Stack, issuing carved-ice credit chits and regulating fish prices.

hardState.name: The Midnight Claws
hardState.description: A clandestine syndicate ruling Nightfall Shelf from the shadows, smuggling forbidden tech and siphoning magic from the Glow-Fissure.

catalyzedEvents.action: forged alliance between The Midnight Claws and Thud 's Circle

hardState.name: High-Beak Auditor Selka
hardState.description: The meticulous mayor of Aurora Stack, famed for balancing ledgers as easily as she balances on sheer ice walls.

catalyzedEvents.action: seized control of Krill Shoals
established trade route between The Gentle Void and Nightfall Shelf
established trade route between The Tranquil Void and The Gentle Void

hardState.name: Tide-Splitter Rukan
hardState.description: A daring super-penguin hero of Aurora Stack, whose experimental fishing gun techniques doubled the colony's catch.

hardState.name: Shadow-Broker Nyla
hardState.description: The unofficial mayor of Nightfall Shelf, a veiled negotiator who settles disputes before anyone admits they exist.

hardState.name: Fissure-Walker Draen
hardState.description: A reckless hero of Nightfall Shelf who walks the very lip of the Glow-Fissure to draw power from its light.

hardState.name: Fissure-Drawn Runes
hardState.description: A school of ice-magic where glowing sigils are etched with claws chilled in the light of the Glow-Fissure.

hardState.name: Harmonic Harpoon Arrays
hardState.description: Advanced fishing guns that fire sonic-locked harpoons, letting penguins reel in entire shoals with minimal effort.

hardState.name: The Gentle Void
hardState.description: A mystical site where Fissure-Drawn Runes manifests with unusual intensity

hardState.name: The Great Thaw
hardState.description: A period of exploration and colony founding as the ice recedes

hardState.name: The Faction Wars
hardState.description: Resource scarcity leads to inter-colony conflicts

hardState.name: The Clever Ice Age
hardState.description: Technology and magic flourish as penguins seek solutions

hardState.name: The Orca Incursion
hardState.description: External threats unite the colonies against common enemies

hardState.name: The Frozen Peace
hardState.description: Rebuilding and consolidation after the wars

hardState.name: The Wealth Era
hardState.description: Economic prosperity driven by 6 trade connections

hardState.name: Noleriaireio
hardState.description: A mystical mystical shrine manifesting magical energies

hardState.name: Ioaea
hardState.description: A mysterious phenomenon deep in the ice, near Aurora Stack

hardState.name: 's Decree
hardState.description: A great festival celebrating abundance and prosperity, held in Aurora Stack

hardState.name: Iatheaemilauva'nio
hardState.description: Innovation developed by The Icebound Exchange

hardState.name: The Submission Law
hardState.description: Emergency measure enacted in Nightfall Shelf

hardState.name: Zovb'zem Method
hardState.description: A breakthrough in ice manipulation developed by The Midnight Claws at Aurora Stack

hardState.name: The Black Order
hardState.description: A mystical cult drawn to the power near The Glow-Fissure

hardState.name: Dokro
hardState.description: The enigmatic prophet of a mystical cult near The Glow-Fissure

hardState.name: Tide Unity
hardState.description: A breakthrough in ice manipulation developed by The Icebound Exchange at Nightfall Shelf

hardState.name: Glacial Fissure
hardState.description: A mysterious phenomenon deep in the ice, near Aurora Stack

hardState.name: Innovative School of 3 Arts
hardState.description: A unified tradition encompassing Harmonic Harpoon Arrays, Iatheaemilauva'nio, Tide Unity. Formed from 3 related abilities practiced by multiple penguins.

hardState.name: The The Icebound Exchange-The Black Order War
hardState.description: A major conflict between 2 factions

entityKindDistribution.comment: Distribution of entity kinds - should sum to 1.0

perKind.comment: Each entity kind should also follow this distribution

relationshipDistribution.comment: Prevent over-concentration in single relationship types

graphConnectivity.comment: Multiple interconnected clusters, not uniform soup
graphConnectivity.clusteringComment: Only relationships with strength >= 0.6 form clusters (narrative-strong bonds)

clusterSizeDistribution.comment: Few large clusters, many small ones

cultures.name: World
cultures.description: Transcendent entities that belong to the world itself - eras, major occurrences, and world-spanning events.

cultures.name: Aurora Stack
cultures.description: The orderly, trade-focused culture of Aurora Stack colony. Values commerce, organization, and technological progress.

cultures.name: Nightfall Shelf
cultures.description: The secretive, mystical culture of Nightfall Shelf colony. Values cunning, magic, and shadow dealings.

cultures.name: Orca Raiders
cultures.description: The fierce warrior culture of the orca raiders. Values strength, conquest, and dominance.
